00043     template<typename BASE, typename DST> static DST endian( const BASE *b ) {
00044         DST ret = 0;
00045 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00046 
00047         for ( short i = 0; i < ( short )sizeof( DST ); i++ )
00048 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00049         for ( short i = ( short )sizeof( DST ) - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00050 #else
00051 #error "Sorry your endianess is not supported. What the heck are you comiling on ??"
00052 #endif
00053             ret += b[i] << i * 8;
00054 
00055         return ret;
00056     }
